dense.desc_cn: 密集模式；占用更少的空间

dark.desc: The component background color lights up the parent's background (as opposed to default behavior which is to darken it); Works unless you specify a CSS background color for it
dark.desc_cn: 组件背景颜色使父对象的背景变亮（与默认行为相反，默认行为是使其变暗）；除非为其指定CSS背景色，否则将正常工作

default.desc: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component
default.desc_cn: 组件的devland unslotted内容中的默认插槽
